EmailTemplate.subject: Data analysis reveals the true value of virtual primary care
EmailTemplate.textOnly: The power of virtual primary care Good health starts with quality primary care, but according to Teladoc Health data, most people (four out of five adults) don’t have a dedicated primary care physician. Virtual primary care has the power to give more people more options to connect with primary care providers. After looking at data from a sample of 3,000+ virtual primary care members, we saw the program positively changing the care experience by: • Increasing access to primary (and other) care • Enhancing member interactions with their care team • Driving improved clinical outcomes Get all the results and explore real member experiences in the Teladoc Health Virtual Primary Care white paper today. About Teladoc Health: Teladoc Health is transforming the healthcare experience and empowering people everywhere to live healthier lives. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages more than a decade of expertise and data-driven insights to meet the growing virtual care needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
